original_text:
Lady of Egypt
Parlando di tematiche abusate nel mondo delle slot online (ma non per questo meno divertenti), quella dell’Antico Egitto non fa eccezione, anzi: è sicuramente sul podio tra le più amate. D’altronde questo paese e la sua storia contengono tutto ciò che cerchiamo in una slot: mistero, ricchezze e fascino.
Tre caratteristiche che definiscono anche alcune delle donne più famose di tutti i tempi: Cleopatra e Nefertiti, figure a cui è stata dedicata Lady of the Egypt della WMS.
In questa breve recensione andremo a fare luce su questa slot sia da un punto di vista prettamente grafico, sia da un punto di vista di meccaniche di gioco.
Grafica e sonoro di Lady of Egypt
Non finiremo mai di dirlo: anche l’occhio vuole la sua parte, motivo per cui iniziamo ogni recensione parlando proprio di questo aspetto. La tematica relativa all’antico Egitto permea l’intera slot, non solo per quanto riguarda i simboli che si trovano all’interno della griglia di gioco (i quali mostrano illustrazioni fatte con ottimo gusto) ma anche per la musica che si attiva durante il gioco e durante la modalità bonus.
La novità introdotta dalla WMS con questa slot è relativa però alla griglia vera e propria.
Come giocare a Lady of Egypt
La WMS ha fatto della propria politica quella di associare slot dall’aspetto e le meccaniche tradizionali a slot uniche nel loro genere. Avremo modo di vedere altri titoli simili nel prossimo punto della nostra recensione, per ora andiamo a vedere perché definiamo unica Lady of Egypt.
Se la maggior parte delle slot online utilizza un meccanismo 5*3 in cui vengono mostrati quindici simboli a ogni giocata, in questo caso si assiste a un meccanismo unico nel suo genere. Potremmo definire quello di Lady of Egypt uno schema 9*3 con 9 rulli che ruotano contemporaneamente. In realtà il nostro gioco si concentrerà solamente su tre rulli alla volta: ottenuta una combinazione vincente nei primi tre rulli, l’interfaccia di gioco si sposterà di due rulli sulla destra in cui avremo la possibilità di ottenere una vincita combinata.
Il processo si ripete fino a che non si arriva all’ultimo rullo (speciale in grado di assegnare il jackpot) o fino a che non finiscono le combinazioni vincenti. Questo meccanismo particolare non solo rende molto più divertente il gameplay, ma dà la possibilità di ottenere vincite alte grazie alla presenza di simboli Wild, Scatter e dei moltiplicatori.
Se infatti la vincita sui primi 3 rulli non viene condizionata da quelle successive, la seconda vincita concatenata ottiene un moltiplicatore X2 sul suo valore. Nella terza il moltiplicatore sale a X3 e nella quarta (appena prima del jackpot) arriva a x5.
Slot simili a Lady of Egypt
Come abbiamo avuto modo di dire in precedenza, questo non è il primo caso in cui la WMS propone delle slot dal gameplay unico e particolare. Lo stesso (sebbene per motivazioni diverse) lo troviamo in Fire Queen e in Giant’s Gold.
Se poi vogliamo parlare della tematica e non del gameplay, anche l’Egitto è particolarmente caro a questa casa di sviluppo, da Egyption Riches fino a Rome & Egypt, così come per altre case come la Novomatic con il famoso titolo Book of Ra.

raw_translation.response:
Lady of Egypt

When it comes to overused themes in online slots (but no less exciting for it), ancient Egypt is no exception - in fact, it's definitely one of the most beloved. After all, this country and its history contain everything we look for in a slot: mystery, riches and charm.

It's these same three characteristics that define some of the most famous women of all time: Cleopatra and Nefertiti, figures to whom WMS has dedicated Lady of Egypt.

In this short review, we'll shed some light on this slot from both a graphical and gameplay perspective. 

Graphics and Sound of Lady of Egypt

We'll never tire of saying it: the eye also wants its share, which is why we always start by talking about this aspect. The theme of ancient Egypt permeates the entire slot, not just with regards to the symbols found within the game grid (which display tastefully illustrated graphics) but also in the music that plays during the game and during the bonus mode.

However, WMS has introduced a new feature with this slot: a unique game grid. 

How to Play Lady of Egypt

WMS has made it their policy to associate slots with traditional appearances and mechanics with slots that are unique in their kind. We'll see other similar titles in the next part of our review, but for now let's take a look at what makes Lady of Egypt so unique.

While most online slots use a 5x3 mechanism that shows fifteen symbols on each play, in this case we see a mechanism that is unique in its kind. We could define Lady of Egypt's grid as a 9x3 system with 9 reels that spin simultaneously.

In reality, our game will only focus on three reels at a time: once a winning combination is obtained in the first three reels, the game interface will shift two reels to the right, where we will have the chance to obtain a combined win. 

The process is repeated until we reach the last reel (which is special in its ability to assign the jackpot) or until there are no more winning combinations. This particular mechanism not only makes gameplay more fun, but also offers the chance to win big thanks to the presence of Wild and Scatter symbols and multipliers.

If the first three reel win is not affected by subsequent wins, the second winning combination will receive a 2x multiplier on its value. In the third, the multiplier increases to 3x, and in the fourth (just before the jackpot), it reaches 5x. 

Slots similar to Lady of Egypt

As we mentioned earlier, this isn't the first time that WMS has offered slots with unique and unusual gameplay. The same (although for different reasons) can be said for Fire Queen and Giant's Gold.

If we want to talk about the theme and not the gameplay, Egypt is particularly dear to this development house, from Egyption Riches to Rome & Egypt, as well as other houses like Novomatic and the famous title Book of Ra.

raw_translation_without_faq.response: Lady of Egypt is an online slot game from WMS that has an ancient Egypt theme. The game features tasteful graphics that make use of common Egyptian symbols as well as unique music in both regular and bonus modes. response.headline: Gameplay mechanics
response.content: Lady of Egypt features a unique grid system that sets it apart from other online slots. It utilizes a 9x3 system with 9 reels that spin simultaneously, while the game interface shifts two reels to the right after achieving a winning combination on the first three reels. The process is repeated until the last reel or until no more winning combinations are obtained.

response.headline: Graphics and theme
response.content: Lady of Egypt is graphically pleasing, with tastefully illustrated symbols that follow the ancient Egypt theme. The music and sound effects add an extra layer of immersion, further emphasizing the overall theme of the game.

response.headline: Bonus features
response.content: Lady of Egypt offers players the chance to win big with the presence of Wild and Scatter symbols, multipliers, and a jackpot feature. The multiplier increases with each win, with the fourth and final win before the jackpot having a 5x multiplier.

response.headline: Comparison to other WMS slots
response.content: WMS is known for producing unique and unusual games, and Lady of Egypt is no exception. It compares favorably with other WMS games like Fire Queen and Giant's Gold, which are also known for their unique gameplay mechanics. Lady of Egypt also shares similar themes with other WMS titles, including Roman & Egypt and Egyptian Riches, along with popular games from other developers, such as Book of Ra.

response.headline: Music and sound effects
response.content: Music and sound effects are an important part of Lady of Egypt's overall gaming experience. The music chosen for the game enhances the ancient Egypt theme and emphasizes the mystery and allure of the country's rich history. The sound effects used for the game's bonus mode add to the overall excitement and fun of the game.

Below is a review for the slot game "Lady of Egypt".

Gameplay mechanics

- No FAQ
- No Notes

WMS has made it their policy to associate slots with traditional appearances and mechanics with slots that are unique in their kind. We'll see other similar titles in the next part of our review, but for now let's take a look at what makes Lady of Egypt so unique.

While most online slots use a 5x3 mechanism that shows fifteen symbols on each play, in this case we see a mechanism that is unique in its kind. We could define Lady of Egypt's grid as a 9x3 system with 9 reels that spin simultaneously.

In reality, our game will only focus on three reels at a time: once a winning combination is obtained in the first three reels, the game interface will shift two reels to the right, where we will have the chance to obtain a combined win. 

The process is repeated until we reach the last reel (which is special in its ability to assign the jackpot) or until there are no more winning combinations. This particular mechanism not only makes gameplay more fun, but also offers the chance to win big thanks to the presence of Wild and Scatter symbols and multipliers.

If the first three reel win is not affected by subsequent wins, the second winning combination will receive a 2x multiplier on its value. In the third, the multiplier increases to 3x, and in the fourth (just before the jackpot), it reaches 5x. 

Slots similar to Lady of Egypt

As we mentioned earlier, this isn't the first time that WMS has offered slots with unique and unusual gameplay. The same (although for different reasons) can be said for Fire Queen and Giant's Gold.

If we want to talk about the theme and not the gameplay, Egypt is particularly dear to this development house, from Egyption Riches to Rome & Egypt, as well as other houses like Novomatic and the famous title Book of Ra.

faq.question: What is Lady of Egypt?
faq.answer: Lady of Egypt is an online slot game developed by WMS that revolves around the theme of ancient Egypt and features a unique 9-reel, 3-row game grid with shifting reels mechanism.

faq.question: How do I win at Lady of Egypt?
faq.answer: To win at Lady of Egypt, you need to land winning combinations of symbols on the game grid, starting from the first three reels. The game grid will shift two reels to the right for each consecutive win until there are no more wins.

faq.question: What is the maximum payout in Lady of Egypt?
faq.answer: The maximum payout in Lady of Egypt is the jackpot, which can be won by landing three Golden Ankh symbols on the ninth reel with a 5x multiplier on the fourth winning combination. The amount of the jackpot depends on the bet size.

faq.question: What are the special symbols in Lady of Egypt?
faq.answer: Lady of Egypt features Wild and Scatter symbols that can help you form winning combinations and trigger bonus features. The Golden Ankh symbol is the most valuable symbol and can award the jackpot.

faq.question: What is the shifting reels mechanism in Lady of Egypt?
faq.answer: The shifting reels mechanism is a unique feature in Lady of Egypt. After each winning combination on the first three reels, the game grid shifts two reels to the right, where players can try to form another winning combination with a multiplier on their value.

faq.question: What other slots are similar to Lady of Egypt?
faq.answer: WMS has developed other slots with unique gameplay mechanics, such as Fire Queen and Giant's Gold. Other popular Egypt-themed slots include Book of Ra by Novomatic and Egyptian Riches and Rome & Egypt by WMS.

faq.question: What is the RTP of Lady of Egypt?
faq.answer: The RTP (Return to Player) of Lady of Egypt is 95.08%, which is around the industry average for online slots.

faq.question: Can I play Lady of Egypt on mobile devices?
faq.answer: Yes, Lady of Egypt is optimized for playing on mobile devices, including smartphones and tablets. You can play it on your mobile browser or download a casino app that features this game.

Review: Lady of Egypt

When it comes to overused themes in online slots (but no less exciting for it), ancient Egypt is no exception - in fact, it's definitely one of the most beloved. After all, this country and its history contain everything we look for in a slot: mystery, riches and charm.

It's these same three characteristics that define some of the most famous women of all time: Cleopatra and Nefertiti, figures to whom WMS has dedicated Lady of Egypt.

In this short review, we'll shed some light on this slot from both a graphical and gameplay perspective. 

Graphics and Sound of Lady of Egypt

We'll never tire of saying it: the eye also wants its share, which is why we always start by talking about this aspect. The theme of ancient Egypt permeates the entire slot, not just with regards to the symbols found within the game grid (which display tastefully illustrated graphics) but also in the music that plays during the game and during the bonus mode.

However, WMS has introduced a new feature with this slot: a unique game grid. 

How to Play Lady of Egypt

WMS has made it their policy to associate slots with traditional appearances and mechanics with slots that are unique in their kind. We'll see other similar titles in the next part of our review, but for now let's take a look at what makes Lady of Egypt so unique.

While most online slots use a 5x3 mechanism that shows fifteen symbols on each play, in this case we see a mechanism that is unique in its kind. We could define Lady of Egypt's grid as a 9x3 system with 9 reels that spin simultaneously.

In reality, our game will only focus on three reels at a time: once a winning combination is obtained in the first three reels, the game interface will shift two reels to the right, where we will have the chance to obtain a combined win. 

The process is repeated until we reach the last reel (which is special in its ability to assign the jackpot) or until there are no more winning combinations. This particular mechanism not only makes gameplay more fun, but also offers the chance to win big thanks to the presence of Wild and Scatter symbols and multipliers.

If the first three reel win is not affected by subsequent wins, the second winning combination will receive a 2x multiplier on its value. In the third, the multiplier increases to 3x, and in the fourth (just before the jackpot), it reaches 5x. 

Slots similar to Lady of Egypt

As we mentioned earlier, this isn't the first time that WMS has offered slots with unique and unusual gameplay. The same (although for different reasons) can be said for Fire Queen and Giant's Gold.

If we want to talk about the theme and not the gameplay, Egypt is particularly dear to this development house, from Egyption Riches to Rome & Egypt, as well as other houses like Novomatic and the famous title Book of Ra.

faq.answer: The chances of winning the jackpot in Lady of Egypt are not specified, but are likely to be relatively rare due to the large payout amount offered.
